title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect information on custom cookie name and URL rewriting in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1
description: The information provided in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 is incorrect regarding the effect of custom cookie names on URL rewriting.
EB: Expected result: According to the information in ch.7.1.1, the URL for the Reload link should be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F.
